Ontology Development Resources

New to Cyc? Read up on some tutorials to get started on ontology development!

The Ontologists Handbook explores the principles of ontology development and knowledge editing. Handbook sections include Writing Efficient CycL, KE and OE Tools, and CycL Queries.

Other useful links:

  • Cyc Basics
  • Best Practices

  • Glossary

For additional information, refer to the documentation page on the Cycorp homepage.
